sys_hub_action_instance_v2.comment: in training course table fetch the course record whose sys id matches the course selected in the registration table.
seat not available updates registration status to waitlisted
updates registration status to registered and registration date todays date

sys_hub_flow_logic_instance_v2.comment: check seat availability in course table
